attributes.review: I didn’t open it yet but i can tell this app is terrible because it’s under Trump’s administration. Look at the shape of America right now. For the Trump supporters YOUR president runs to social media when something happens to America instead of handling it.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see if I should vote for Trump.  This app is terrible when I downloaded it my phone crashed and died.  Then for some odd reason it flew across the room and hit my sister in the face.  I can’t believe the app would do that.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: This app is so horrible I can’t even think of words for it. They were right to leave a 1 star for it. The people that put 5 stars are such a disgrace to mankind! This app is INFESTED with bugs, it is so super slow, and uses up 99% of my data!
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: The app blow up in my face and I burned my face off then with my no eyes I deleted the app and my face was back to normal my face look like this 🤯🤢even my fortnite character disconnected when I downloaded it and deleted it went back to normal
attributes.title: I almost died with the app

attributes.review: donald trump is a racist orange that does not support black lives. he can go to hell. i can say more things about him but my brain hurts just thinking about all of them. and he deport me cuz i’m and american citizen. i hope he does NOT become president. thank you.
attributes.title: trump can go to hell and burn

attributes.review: i opened the app and it wouldn’t stop glitching. Then when i went to delete it it wouldn’t let me and my back screen was Donald at a closeup of his face making duck lips. it wouldn’t let me change it and i do not suggest this app for anyone.
attributes.title: I HATE this app

attributes.review: I opened to app to see pictures of pornography. The pornography seemed to be imitations of Melania Trump. This is truly outrageous and not okay. I am underage and this was illegal, immoral, and indesirable. I will NOT be downloading this app again. If another incounter happens again, i WILL be contacting the police. Expect a lawyer, expect gen z.
attributes.title: Pornography!!

attributes.review: This app has brought shame to my community. My parents look at me as I wept with tears of sadness. His campaign had ruined my life, don’t let it ruin yours. Whenever I see an orange I cry with tears of despair. I can no longer see happiness when I see orange. I had no choice but to abandon my ginger cat.
attributes.title: Wow

attributes.review: it asked me for my number so it could send spam calls to me and that is unexplainable. it also wanted to use my location while on and off of the app and that is so creepy. don’t get this app it is a joke and a way for ppl to stalk you.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE DO NOT GET
